General.Name: Tibet Cheezheng Tibetan Medicine Co Ltd
General.Description: Tibet Cheezheng Tibetan Medicine Co., Ltd. together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, production, and sale of Tibetan medicine in China. It provides drug products in the areas of cardiovascular, respiratory, digestive, urinary and reproductive system, nervous system, musculoskeletal system, and gynecological disorders. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Nyingchi, China. Tibet Cheezheng Tibetan Medicine Co., Ltd. operates as  a subsidiary of Gansu Qizheng Industry Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: 2 Tibet Nyingchi Deji Road, Nyingchi, China, 860000
